title: Jerome Powell’s Second Term And The Latest On Markets
itunes:title: Jerome Powell’s Second Term And The Latest On Markets
description:
Kaleb Nygaard, Senior Research Associate at the Yale Program on Financial Stability and former statistical analyst at the Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago, discusses President Biden’s picks of Jerome Powell as Fed Chair and Lael Brainard as Vice Chair. Jim Chirico, CEO of Avaya, talks about labor shortages, remote work, and how companies are planning returns to offices. Kriti Gupta, Markets correspondent with Bloomberg News, discusses investing news and market outlook for the rest of the year. Priya Misra, Managing Director and Global Head of Rates Strategy at TD Securities, talks about market expectations in the wake of Jerome Powell’s nomination for a second term as the head of the Federal Reserve. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Taylor Riggs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
